==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|唐|手}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{m|ja|唐||[[Tang Dynasty]]; [[China]]|tr=kara}} + {{m|ja|手||hand|tr=te}}, as the art was originally transmitted from China to Okinawa, and thence to mainland Japan.
